entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
